Cardrender Marketing Site

Summary:
Cardrender is an enterprise-grade digital business card and email signature platform for teams. The site provides comprehensive documentation, pricing information, and thought leadership content about digital networking, team branding, and contact management analytics.

Primary pages:
- https://cardrender.com/ - Homepage with features, stats, and testimonials
- https://cardrender.com/features - Detailed feature showcase with pain points and solutions
- https://cardrender.com/pricing - Pricing plans with FAQ
- https://cardrender.com/blog - Blog index with latest articles
- https://cardrender.com/blog/digital-business-cards - Why digital business cards are the new standard for teams
- https://cardrender.com/docs - Documentation hub
- https://cardrender.com/docs/getting-started - Complete setup guide for first-time users
- https://cardrender.com/docs/teams - Team management and role-based access control
- https://cardrender.com/docs/branding-and-templates - Brand consistency and template management
- https://cardrender.com/docs/analytics - Tracking views, clicks, and networking ROI
- https://cardrender.com/docs/api - REST API and webhooks documentation
- https://cardrender.com/docs/security - SOC 2, SSO, and enterprise security features

Key Topics:
- Digital business cards for enterprise teams
- Virtual business card creation and sharing
- Team networking and contact management
- Business card analytics and ROI tracking
- Brand consistency at scale
- QR code business cards
- Email signature management
- SSO and enterprise security (SOC 2 Type II)
- Salesforce, HubSpot, Microsoft 365 integrations
- Team collaboration and directory management

Target Audience:
- Enterprise teams (50-10,000+ users)
- Sales teams and operations leaders
- Marketing and brand managers
- IT administrators and security teams
- HR and recruiting departments
- Event and conference organizers

Technical Specifications:
- Built with Astro v5.16.6 (SSR mode)
- Deployed on Cloudflare Pages
- Comprehensive Schema.org structured data (Article, TechArticle, Organization)
- Open Graph and Twitter Card meta tags
- Mobile-responsive design with Tailwind CSS
- Breadcrumb navigation for SEO

Content Structure:
- All blog posts include: title, description, author, category, keywords, structured data, canonical URLs
- All documentation includes: prerequisites, step-by-step instructions, related docs, last updated dates
- Enhanced frontmatter with SEO and LLM optimization best practices
- Internal linking strategy for improved navigation and SEO

API endpoint used by pricing:
- https://app.cardrender.com/api/public/plans

SEO Resources:
- Sitemap: https://cardrender.com/sitemap.xml
- Robots.txt: https://cardrender.com/robots.txt
- SEO Implementation Guide: /SEO-LLM-BEST-PRACTICES.md

Primary Keywords:
digital business cards, virtual business cards, team networking, business card analytics, QR code cards, contact management, sales enablement, brand consistency, enterprise card management, networking ROI
